summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GymLog MVP - Local-First fitness tracking app with IndexedDB storage and cloud backup functionality

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 422 error when backup data format is incorrect

ui_bugs.issue: Form fields not reset after successful workout logging

integration_issues.issue: Backup to cloud fails with 422 error - likely data format mismatch

passed_tests: Backend backup creation and retrieval endpoints working
Frontend loads with correct dark theme (black background)
Navigation between all 4 tabs (Log, History, Exercises, Settings)
Exercise selection dropdown with seeded exercises (Squat, Bench Press, etc.)
Workout logging flow (select exercise, enter weight/reps, save)
Success toast 'Workout logged!' appears after saving
History page displays logged workouts with correct date and details
Exercise list shows all seeded exercises correctly
User ID generation and display in Settings
Total volume calculation in History (150kg Ã— 8 = 1,200kg)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix cloud backup 422 error - check data format being sent to /api/backup endpoint. Minor: Fix form reset after workout logging and modal overlay click blocking.
